name: ConceptMapR5UsageContextElementsForR4UsageContext
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `UsageContext` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions.
Element `UsageContext` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `UsageContext`.

FHIR R5 ComplexType `UsageContext` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 extensions.
Element `UsageContext` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `UsageContext` is not mapped.
Element `UsageContext.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `UsageContext.code`.
Element `UsageContext.code` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `UsageContext` is not mapped.

Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`.
Element `UsageContext.value[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `UsageContext.value[x]`.
Note that the target element context `UsageContext.value[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `UsageContext`.
Element `UsageContext.value[x]` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `UsageContext` is not mapped.
